website_summaries.verdict: Xiaomi has proven once again that you don’t have to spend silly money to get a great product. The AirDots are good sounding buds that tuck neatly into your ears and avoid the silly dangling appearance of other, more expensive, offerings. Everything about them is simple, including paring, controls, and the general design. The lack of volume buttons and minimal waterproofing are minor complaints, but the overall package is very impressive, especially when you consider the price.

customer_reviews.title: Left ear piece cuts out.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if they're faulty but when I'm on my bike (and only when on my bike) the left ear cuts out intermittently or the sound is distorted. In the gym or at home though, there's no issue. Sound quality wise, they're very good for the price but they're virtually useless to me as I cycle everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: El Presidenté

customer_reviews.title: Pray they pair!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfy in ear phones I've ever had by quite a distance, even comparing with memory foam. My criticism of these is I had to Google how to master reset them because only one ear would work no matter what I tried. In general though, if you don't have the teething issue I had, I don't see how you couldn't love these. I'm as chuffed as a badger in mating season 😊
customer_reviews.author: JMB1982

customer_reviews.title: There was no Charging cable in the box
customer_reviews.text: Nice little headphones for the price. Sound quality is great . I listen techno music and I can say for sure that the bass is decent. I give 1 star only for the fact that there is no charging cable with the box, so I dong know how to charge my headphones .. disappointed for that !
customer_reviews.author: THEODOROS L.

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect both for stereo.
customer_reviews.text: Can't get the units to pair with each other prior to pairing with my phone. So can only select one or the other. No stereo sound. Know my phone is capable as have bluetooth speakers. Tried everything beyond following the manual. Nothing seems to work. May be defective. Returning for refund. Beware, Amazon will not take charge of any returns with rechageable batteries involved regardless of fault!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B

customer_reviews.title: Really really poor.
customer_reviews.text: I was really happy with my Xiaomi phone and thought these would make a good addition to pair with it. When they arrived they looked the part but when using them its another story. The audio quality is really tinny and scratchy, but worst of all the left earphone keeps losing connection to the right so the sound keeps cutting out every few seconds. I've tried numerous times different troubleshooting suggestions to fix this but to no avail. This is incredibly irritating.
customer_reviews.author: RC1986

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless Ear Phones Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got recommended these from a friend who mentioned that the company who make them are big in China ! Extremely good quality for £28 from amazon. Easy to follow instructions sound quality good. They fit in a tiny box with which comes with usb lead not the plug but in this day and age easy to get. Very pleased with mine so far versatile and compact. The phones come with spare ear phone cover. I found as long as you put them in firmly they don’t easily come out. You can use one or two together very useful if your at work and need an ear to hear things .
customer_reviews.author: Obi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for what they are
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I mean I can only say positive things about these ear buds, I really did expeothem to be useless for the price but I'm blown away. They perform well with music, spoken word and video the only issue is the bass could be a bit deeper but at this price point it's more than acceptable. I was worried they would fall out all the time as I have biggish ears they are secure and stayed out on a 5km run. I was going to hold out for the Amazon buds but needed to replace my old earphones, glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: 🦉

customer_reviews.title: OKAY
customer_reviews.text: Would've been perfect, the sound quality and even noise level is perfect for the price. the only downside, though, is that it takes microUSB and most devices nowadays take USB type C. I had to buy a microUSB cable to charge it since charging cable wasn't included :( UPDATE1: It stopped working all of a sudden. everytime I connect it to my phone it shows the battery percentage decreasing rapidly and then shutting off even after hours of charging? UPDATE2: It acts funny but started working just fine now. Notice that you have to remove the small blue protective film inside the earbuds they’re quite small.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Stop thinking about getting them and get them!
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent little ear buds, feels almost surreal at first having such rich sound in your ears without any dangling cables reminding you they're there. I have no idea how good the batteries are as every time I take them out of my ears they go back into the charging/storage case. Build quality is very good and they come with 3 sizes of ear tips.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Herbert

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this earbud every day for 2 months. The voice quality is very good. Perfect for even crowded places such as underground. The battery performance is very good. It's even better when you use the buds single. It doesn't fall while jogging. The only thing that you need to care is to take out the right bud from the box first. The left one pairs to the right very easily if you put them in this order. You can answer the phone, pause or play songs and Youtube by one click on the bud. There is no volume adjustment button on it, but none of the earbuds in the market has. I'm very happy with the item. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I'd been thinking about dipping my toes into wireless earbuds for a while now and have to say with these I am not disappointed at all. They connect almost instantly to my android phone and never disconnect. The battery life is still very impressive and when I'm sat at my desk I put the case on charge. Audio quality is impressive, certain songs sound a little too bassy but due to the nature of in ears this can be a problem with a lot of in ears. My only problem with them is thta I have had several complaints from callers saying that they can hardly hear me or the background noise is just as loud as my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Englishgirlamericanman

customer_reviews.title: Can't get any better than this
customer_reviews.text: What a great pair of wireless earbuds. They are very light, good fit in ear and audio quality is surprisingly good considering the price. Strong bass and overall can't really complain Quick and flawless pairing with a good range Bluetooth. Happy with the battery life even though I only use them occasionally but believe battery is good enough for someone who uses them on daily basis. Final verdict: highly recommend if you looking for earbuds on budget.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Redmi Dots...low cost reflected in battery life and charging
customer_reviews.text: Generally they are ok, but charging in their case seems a bit hap hazzard - I put them in their case expecting a decent charge to occur, but that is not always the situation....occasionally, I use them again the day after charging in their charging case, and they only last an hour...or at least one of the pods lasts only an hour. Sound quality is good, but pick up of the mic (if using for phone calls is not great...picks up lots of his...distortion). I'll use them but will go better quality when replacing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great true wireless earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Having tried the Soundpeats and then these it's clear these have around the same sound quality (get alittle louder and quieter withput distortion), they also stay conected and are easy to connect after following the instructions on how to pair them for stereo as both my sets arrived not paired to each other. The battery case is small but lasts a full day and the buds them selves are lasting around 3.5 to 4 hours between charging. I use with a Mi Mix 3 and a Razer Phone with no issues going between the two. They are well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Laluglu

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this product 6 weeks ago, tried them out on the day of delivery. Instructions were good, got both earphones working. Used them about a week later still great. Haven't had a chance to use them again until recently so I charged them, for some reason only 1 was working. I thought maybe I had placed it into the box wrong, then 10 minutes later the other one has lost battery. So last night I made sure the connections were in line. Only the left was charging. Tried connecting it to my phone, and now it decides it doesn't want to be seen as a media/audio device. So now I have a product I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Incredible battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality from phone is fantastic for both audio files and calls. Noise cancellation works really well. Only downside is the quality when connected to a laptop is not great but I think that is more to do with the laptops being older and having older bluetooth standard compared to new phones with bluetooth 5.0 etc. Cheap for what they do, fit is excellent and they come with 3 different size buds for all different ears.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Critic

customer_reviews.title: Good sound that makes them worth more!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift but had a great review back. Note these are smaller than what you would expect so more discreet. They are very comfortable and easily forgotten about. The sound is very good with a good bass for music lovers. The range is good and works well 2 rooms away making it easy to misplace phone! Battery life after a few weeks use is as advertised. Noise cancellation not tested as they are mainly used indoor.
customer_reviews.author: Dani M

customer_reviews.title: I like it and they are original Xiaomi
customer_reviews.text: In this price hard to found better! Sound is ok. I like the way it fits in to my ear. I like it that much that decided to buy another pair for my wife from ebay and it was fake! Looked same but the quality and details was a bit different. Called for return and refund. Be careful with fake ones. If I would not have this ones to compare I would think the one I have from ebay was original Xiaomi and I would not be happy. These ones are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good value and work quite well
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these as a gift for my parents. I did not want to spend an excessive amount because I didn't know if they would use them. However, my mum in particular (who is not tech savvy at all) uses them frequently and finds them pretty easy to operate. There are no doubt better quality earbuds out there, but hear are a really good starter or second pair (if you can spare the cash).
customer_reviews.author: Techie Wannabee

customer_reviews.title: Not so impressive
customer_reviews.text: Reading all reviews was eager to try them... They are snug fit and as fee users said very difficult to remove from the charging case.. But the sound quality blows them all... Nice bass and good mix of treble... However after 4 days of use I am slightly annoyed by the frequent disconnects and disruption I see... Had Jabra Elite 65t and had no such issues.. Over all good Earbuds for reasonable price...
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: A bit quirky but good value.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is brilliant for the price, punchy on the lows, balanced throughout. It happens that they unpair (the left from the right, which is the main headphone). It took me a couple of hours to find out how to solve it, but if it happens to you, take them out of the case, press the button to turn both off then let them go and press it again until the red/white led combination flashes twice (about 20 odd seconds). Delete them from your phone and pair again. A but quirky but good value.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A bargain on a budget
customer_reviews.text: For the price; 5 stars I have some 'Bose truly wireless soundsport things' (awful name) and they much better, alot more bass which is ultimately what these lack however there is a £100 price gulf to consider too. They have decent rande and a button on one side. Feel okay in the hand and a pleasantly small package over all. Purchased for father's day so I can't comment on longevity. Ignoring the price; 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: John Batty and Ben Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Started off a bit shaky
customer_reviews.text: When I first ordered them, I couldn't use them for a while because it would only connect left or right earbud at one time. After a simple Google search and onto a YouTube video, I managed to successfully pair these airbuds to each other and after doing so, I'm very happy with the product. The sound quality is great for the price as is the style. I would definitely recommend these cheap but sturdy buds 👍
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Poor build and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: low cost, nice case, decent battery life, quick charge, easy pairing. Cons: poor sound quality with appalling bass., poor fit, poor quality built. One of the earbuds fell out of my ear whilst walking. It broke on impact with the floor and no longer works. This happened after just 3 weeks of use, but as it was a present the return window had closed. Cost of use: ~£1 per day.
customer_reviews.author: Amygdala28

customer_reviews.title: For the price I think these are good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had these a few days and I really like they. They’re not extremely bassy earphones and do feel a little blown out when you turn up the volume too high. But I find them comfortable, they look good and most importantly they stay in my ears well. I haven’t needed to charge them yet but I’m happy with the life so far. Only thing I have tested properly is the microphone, when I did use it the person on the other side of the car had difficulty hearing me but it was very windy outside.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Sadek

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are amazing but they suffer from a terrible issue... Pairing. I lost count of how many time I have wasted trying to pair them. Once the L and R side decided to dispair and refused to work. Took me 20 minutes to fix the issue. Its a pitty because sound quality is just amazing and the passive noise isolation is so good!
customer_reviews.author: Gabry87

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound when they work without connection drops
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound. Small. Had a replacement since the initial one was having very bad connection drops. Nice design and they are comfy. Basic problem with connection issues in airports or crowded places but at 25 pounds what can you ask. Also they discharge the case completely after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre quality, Faulty unit
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok, a bit too "coloured" for my taste. But I think it would please most people. At higher volume levels unpleasant to listen to. I've returned these because of sync problems between earbuds. The left one kept losing connection during walks and right one would do it from time to time too. Used with iPhone 11. At similar price there are better choices. Especially if you order from Ali~~press.
customer_reviews.author: Wojciech R.

customer_reviews.title: Ok if they'd work
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound but they often cut out when cars goes past for some reason. Totally useless if you wear them outside. And theres no option to skip track or change volume.
customer_reviews.author: ukl19999

customer_reviews.title: Two (now three) big problems
customer_reviews.text: If you only want to hear one of them it has to be the right one. As if you put this one to charge the left one will stop working... This is very annoying when you want to use only one. to save batery but you find that it was useless. Also the lid of the box is not properly attached (a small piece is broken) to the whole box so I have to be very careful opening and closing the box. Edit: after two days the right one started to work worst and worst. Now the volume is about 50% (left one is ok, so far). It's ridiculous...
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: overall they are nice and sleek but as useful as chocolate shoes in summer the sound keeps dipping from different equalizers. there's lots of feedback in the background. they where on charge for about 12 hours during the nighttime and didn't charge at all. to get them to charge i have to place a piece of paper into the case and then weigh it down with something heavy so the earbuds with connect to the charging pins. but they look and feel good...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing freebuds
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, was recommended by my cousin to buy these and don't regret it at all. Easy to use and connectivity with devices is simple and doesn't cut at all, which I had with other Bluetooth speakers or buds. Battery life is amazing. Got them a week ago, charged and the battery is still on. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justina Balciauskaite

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So I very like headphones, but fully recommend that cheap headphones, after all another my headphones quality of sound is just acceptable just all another my headphones 150 and more , so that for 22 pounds is good , one thing what I don’t like it you not able to skip songs from headphones ,but all another staff like plastic or bass or battery life is better then in any another cheap headphones
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuils Mihailovs

customer_reviews.title: Nice earphones, but not suitable for exercise
customer_reviews.text: These are really good earphones for wearing in the office or walking but are not suitable for exercise. I have seen since that they are not advertised as sports earphones but however are described as "sweatproof". However an IPX4 rating isn't as good as other Bluetooth earphones at this price, and I feel that was the reason which one of them stopped working for me after a couple months. These are very nice earphones for casual wear and are great for making phonecalls with, however do not purchase if you are hoping to use them for listening to music while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: Kieran

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: the earbuds come with scratches and looks like it was used. I tried it and can confirm that it doesn't have a noise cancellation function at all. RHS keeps disconnecting and reconnecting with no reason, tried on different phone but the problem was the earbuds Don't Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sam badw

customer_reviews.title: Microphone makes it impossible to ear
customer_reviews.text: Regarding this earphones: Pros: - Good battery life - Aesthetic is pleasing Cons - The microphone is unusable, the person on the receiving end cannot ear anything even if you are on a low noise area - Very tricky to pair both of them and the instructions are not clear. - The Grip is very bad as they keep falling even with a normal walk pace, even trying all the tips provided - The sound overall is very poor, sometimes it sounds like a ruptured speaker. Overall, unfortunately, I cannot recommend this item, I don't know if my set has issues or if this is the usual performance for this equipment.
customer_reviews.author: kinglostsouls

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinary battery life
customer_reviews.text: I have other Xiaomi (pron: She-owe-me) products, and their battery life is extraordinary. I bought these around three weeks ago, and charged them up in their case when I got them for about 90min. I've used them since then for about 14 hours (not non stop, recharging in the case, but each day) and the battery life is still saying 100% on my phone. Amazing. Decent sound quality too, and comfy in the ears. These are the best wireless earbuds I've ever had, top stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ravi M. Naik

customer_reviews.title: Cheap as chips
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome pods for a great value. I primarily got these for running but they have ended up being my everyday earphones. have ran 200 miles while wearing them and not fell out one . The battery life is as good as it gets for the budget. I find the battery last me 4-5 hrs but it takes a few minutes to get them charged up again. And the case holds charge too. Sound quality is not amazing but great for the price. On the flip side, the noise cancelling is just banging. Overall, i am really happy with these ear pods and i highly recommend these earpods
customer_reviews.author: Tongai Blessing

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great value. I've had no problems with pairing. Closer to noise isolation than any other headphones I've got. Battery life when playing is more like 3 hours and some way of snoozing without putting back in the case would be good. Very comfortable. Call quality not great as you'd expect. I'm tempted to buy another pair for when these are charging.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Price/Value Balance
customer_reviews.text: It's actually impossible to find other product that will meet same expectations when it comes to product quality for that price. You definitely cannot go wrong with Xiaomi, not speaking specifically about the redmi headphones only, but everything. Ps. Changing to 4 stars. Seems like i've shot my review too early before. The headphones actually are being interrupted too frequently when connected to computer, which is kinda' annoying already (problem exists 20% of the time, the fix is to change your body position, turn to other side, etc), this problem though exists only when connected to PC, on phone everything appears to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Stanchev

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: They're cheap earbuds. The sound is okay for the price if a little flat, the fit is very good however and the included eartips are fine. The battery like is as advertised and its convenient that they charge back up when in the case. The case also feels very premium too; the lid is magnetic and closes with a satisfying snap. Once you've paired the earbuds they connect to your device once removed from the case.
customer_reviews.author: George Dallow

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for 20£
customer_reviews.text: Lost one of them already. The pairing with my phone (xiaomi mi6) was easy but to connect them to my phone everyday was a pain. The sound quality for the music is fine for the price. I still dont understand how can i use bluetooth headphones ( i also have 300£ sony noise cancelling) for whatsapp, skype, facebook messenger without people hearing background noise. I These are good headphones for a quick bike commute which was the main reason i bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Abdel bidar

customer_reviews.title: Build quality
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was decent at best. These headphones are knockoffs many other £30 ones out there however these are the worst. They dont have many interchangeable ear tips. One of them was missing in my case (smaller ones) and the thing that made me return in is the button press. It was hard to click so clicking it would jam the ear tips down your ear canal and even then it would not click. I got these as replacement of my soundpeats as I lost it in holiday however the quality and build of those headphones were far superior. If you need some earphones I would definitely recommend other ones as this is shocking.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: quick and simple ... I Have Bose QC35 II ...and im very impressive ...wow lol wtf? for this prce? .... MI are very similar sound quality...juz a little bit warm are more in QC35 II .... bass and clarity ..yyyyy I think clarity is for plus in MI hehe...bose costs over or around 300 MO 28 ?? if will be 200 will still perfect choice.... sayonara im going to listen music hehe
customer_reviews.author: Szymon

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable to wear and great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these a few months ago. I don't use them very often, but I have been very pleased with them. I find with a lot of earphones that they work loose in my ears and I have to continually reseat them, BUT NOT with these. A perfect fit and they stay in. The sound quality is certainly good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Self

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect but great for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this product is amazing. Been using for my 10k run and they work perfectly. Sound is ok, it doesnt fall, battery seems fine. It might not compete with its 100£ competitors but if you just want affordable bluetooth earbuds they are great. Two minor things: sometimes the sound just drops off (every 20mn or so for a second) and if you jump up and down it triggers something in the earbuds. Otherwise fine!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P

customer_reviews.title: So so earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They look great, battery life is good. Can charge further from the case, to get a couple of good rounds between plugging in. Sound quality a bit mediocre though - missing detail and warmth. Ok for the price, but won't match the quality brands.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasimo

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental
customer_reviews.text: Started off really nice. Happy with the product. I’ve had them 2 months. Now only one works. Not been dropped nor neglected. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: king kenny

customer_reviews.title: The best wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good the sound is incredible for small wireless in ear. When the base kicks in wow....... the price makes these a must buy. I have bought six of these to give as a gift to my mates. All have the same opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound quality and really nice design.  Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality. Bluetooth connectivity to phone (iPhone 6s) worked first time. Very easy to set up and use. Case and headphones are nicely designed. To be honest, can’t think of anything that could be improved - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mr D J Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Superb for the money
customer_reviews.text: These earphones have been faultless. They hold a good charge and fit securely. I never realised how much better true wireless earphones are than standard bluetooth. Having no cable makes such a difference. No snagging on hats or jackets etc. For the cost you'd be hard to beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Trevsterx

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for money, I purchase a different one that lost only a couple of months. Hope this one can last longer. So far so good, after 3 weeks of use. Easy to operate and pair. Cons, it does look cheap and the box seems of lower quality, sound is not great to hear on loud volumes. But I believe you know what you are paying for.
customer_reviews.author: W&M

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.Not able to pair left one with the right one.
customer_reviews.text: This had serious issues in pairing . Still have not managed to pair the left one with the right.Spent hours reading instruction and watching online videos to get it working. Really would advice to steer clear of this product. Better get something like Apple or Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Mangesh Yadav

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is one of my best buy, I love the simple design, the material are good, the quality of the music It is surprisingly high considering the price, so much versatility and comfort in use. I used for at least 5 months almost every day and the battery is still perfect (basically the battery can last up to 3 consecutive hours in high volume, returning to custody can refilled the battery three times completely).
customer_reviews.author: Alessandro Tonti

customer_reviews.title: Better than you’d expect
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is second to none with these which I was surprised with! Great quality too, they come with 3 different sizes of buds to sit in your ear which can sometimes be a little uncomfortable but usually just adjusting them fixes that and their back to not even feeling like they’re there!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Forsyth

customer_reviews.title: fantastic... and for that price amazing!
customer_reviews.text: for the price - amazing little piece of kit and just as good as the Google buds they replace.xiaomi are a veru Reputable company and a bargain. I bought several pairs to give to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MLeS Liverpool

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The product itself seems to work well, sounds is good especially considered the price. The charging case seems rather cheap and don't think will last long although the earbuds itself are really nice and comfortable. The box and the charging box were a bit dirty, I am guessing the product had been previously returned? Anyways the inside of the box was clean and earbuds looked unused so pretty happy with them overall!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Orr

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound
customer_reviews.text: Expect what you pay, in this case £25. A little disappointed with this Xiaomi product, I think it is not in line with the rest of Xiaomi's products. The sound is really poor for headphones which initially were sold for £50. Moreover, the design is not the best when you carry it for a long time or practice any sport. In conclusion, it is fine for £25 but definitely I wouldn't pay more. It is a pity because I have more Xiaomi products and was very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: ismael gil cruz

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of the airbuds and i was so impressed that i bought 3 more for my grandsons. One didnt work so i contacted the seller and i was sent a replacement straight away. Brilliant , helpful seller. Thank ypu so very much.
customer_reviews.author: kim bronger

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: All was good until after a few days one ear bud stopped working for no apparent reason unfortunately I had to return them And decided to purchase another brand
customer_reviews.author: Ramtastic

customer_reviews.title: Luv them!
customer_reviews.text: i am a big fan of Xiaomi products and these do not disappoint. Cheap and cheerful, they are great for static listening (probably not great for exercise/sport but they don't pretend to be)
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Differently connecting both together
customer_reviews.text: They work well when you can get both sides to connect sound quality is not bad once connected but have a lot of trouble connecting both together haha
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great product! But it broke..
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product, it works great for me. EXCEPT owning th for 2 months one day the button on the right earpiece just stopped working, it's not clickable anymore, it just seems to be stuck as if it's push down. This kind of ruins the experience as at work I only use the right earpiece. It's a shame, as I'm sure this is just an exception, to otherwise nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Vacietis

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, there is a problem with the product.
customer_reviews.text: The product came very quickly. Thank you for that. However, there is a problem with the product. I occasionally have trouble pairing with the phone. Most importantly, the person in front of me cannot hear my voice clearly during the conversation on the phone, and explosion-like sounds are formed under my voice.
customer_reviews.author: Beykan Buyukkaya

customer_reviews.title: Wrong product?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the "Redmi Airdots" and I've got "Mi True Wireless Earbuds", I am not sure if is the same type of earbuds and I have seen in other comments that they have got both types of earbuds. Also for some reason, the cable to charge the earbuds was not in the box. I did manage to try them and the sound is good, it looks that it is good quality, it fits very well in my ear and I liked that I can change the cover for a different size to get a perfect fit in my ear.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: No charging cable included
customer_reviews.text: It is clearly stated in product description that this comes with a charging cable but mine arrived without one. If a seller is lying there is no point going into the quality of product in my opinion. Writing this review just to let people know that you are taking a risk by buying this product as the description provided doesn't match the reality..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great air buds and great sound quality. Could do with volume control on the buds as there are some apps / devices that don't have control over the volume i.e bluetooth transmitter and slightly louder.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. RW

customer_reviews.title: Long hours for music...
customer_reviews.text: So far it's good. No complaints yet. Easy to charge. Usually use it to listen songs for long hours. Nice grip for ears. Like the product.
customer_reviews.author: JazZ

customer_reviews.title: Love these wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Xiaomi are amazing making great products at really affordable prices. Why buy airpods when something like these will do the same job for a quarter of the price. Honestly I love them and they are a lot smaller than airpods and don't stick out of your ear which i love. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mickbo

customer_reviews.title: Very ppor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality ear buds. Don't fit well, keep falling. Noise cancellation is fake. Only one bud has sound during calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Left one stopped working after a couple of months (Barely used)
customer_reviews.text: Bought them in September last year, used it a couple of items. Since November approx the left one stopped working. I've tried every single fix available on the internet, doesn't work. Couldn't return them either and didn't get any answer from the seller regarding how to send them via warranty . They are selling Chinese ones so better buy them from a shop with UK providers.
customer_reviews.author: Iago Fernández

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay they aren't bad, they feel cheap but they give an alright sound quality, and they havent dropped on the bluetooth signal unlike the Jabra elite 65 pair I had.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Moorcroft

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: the right hand bud worked fine, but I could not get the left hand bud to communicate with the right, so I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and basic and no use if you are on the move
customer_reviews.text: You kind of get what you pay for. Decent case, long-lasting charge and easy to use. Sound quality is not mind blowing - good enough for audiobooks. One massive downside is that the sound cuts out a lot when walking or running. Doesn't happen when stationary eg sitting or standing in one place. Wouldn't buy if you are going to be using them on the move.
customer_reviews.author: tahmad

customer_reviews.title: Awesome budget option for bluetooth earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Awesome budget option for bluetooth earbuds. Sound is great for music, calls are a little tinny and pick up ambient noise so caller can hear what's going on around you, but for this price, you'll not get better until you get into the £130-£160 price range.
customer_reviews.author: andyfrance1

customer_reviews.title: Needs English language instructions
customer_reviews.text: No instructions. Only in Chinese. Once I understood that the box that they came in was to charge them no problems but I thought they were faulty but they needed charging
customer_reviews.author: M. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Great product BUT
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is actually great, the only thing that lets them down is the battery which will only last 1-2 hours and they were shipped without a charging cable. I am happy with them otherwise but if an amazon employee is looking, please send me a charging cable.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life and sound
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, can't fault them. Battery life is excellent, so is a lot better than I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Rochford

customer_reviews.title: Great budget offering
customer_reviews.text: The Xiaomi Redmi Airdots is a genuinly decent budget offering for people who need good sound, without breaking bank doing it. The sounds quality is very decent, with good middle-tones, and alright sounds in the low. It does lack a bit of punch when it comes to the deeper tones, but is well within expectations for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Bronãe

customer_reviews.title: Keeps disconnecting when both ears in use
customer_reviews.text: Have had for a month or so keeps disconecting and reconnecting when using both earphones have tried all possible troubleshooting but no fix. Think I've been sent a faulty item
customer_reviews.author: Zidan

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product though it's not best best in the market but it's really nice to have one because it saves the purpose a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel

customer_reviews.title: Nice earbuds, but they are a bit loose.
customer_reviews.text: They sound surprisingly good, but the only problem is the fit. They are a bit loose in the ear.
customer_reviews.author: saul

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, both broke in a week. Ignoring that, a great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of air dots, and they both broke with a week. The auto disconnect and auto charge function stopped working. Other than that if I could have had a working pair that lasted I wouldn't be able to fault them. Small sleek great sound and well worth the £23 I paid for them. It might just have been a bad batch
customer_reviews.author: Dean Van Schoor

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money But not a rival for real buds.
customer_reviews.text: Lthe buds kept falling out of my ears. I tried several sizes; it hard to get them out of the package each time. But once you do, they work well and for long enough between charging. The Bluetooth connectivity is great and quickly detected.
customer_reviews.author: HunterDad19

customer_reviews.title: Impressive at price
customer_reviews.text: Short test for 30 minute jog in the rain and pleasantly surprised at the price point. Time will tell in robustness and battery life. Buttons a little fiddly when in but for less than 30£ I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: lewis mclean

customer_reviews.title: Very poor built quality
customer_reviews.text: not easy to remove from case. pairing between to earbuds is too much hassle. sound quality is not great. Earbuds looks like used not a brand new and even charging case doesn't look like brand new, so many scratches on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chaitali

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I was sceptical cause of the price but like there phones I was surprised on how amazing this product is
customer_reviews.author: Sk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really good earbuds, great battery life, but it can catch you by surprise when the charging case runs out. By far the best wireless I've had.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Parry

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: The volume control so difficult, also there is no noise cancellations at all the item so useless
customer_reviews.author: Salih

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because my husband recommended them after my pair of another brand broke. They are excellent value for money! Good sound quality, easy to use and the battery lasts for ages. I'll definitely be recommending them to anyone looking for wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: missmomo

customer_reviews.title: Expected better quality!
customer_reviews.text: Build quality is poor. Plastic earbuds vibrate a lot if you play loud music, you would notice the sound of plastic containers. Voice call quality is average. Bass and sound quality is fine if you listen to songs at low or medium volume!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they are extremely good wireless earbuds, and well worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Small compact and work flawlessly
customer_reviews.text: Works brilliant. Cannot see the point in paying a fortune on others
customer_reviews.author: Steve. Abrahams

customer_reviews.title: Ear pods
customer_reviews.text: Actually really impressed,put in ear turned on set up on bloothtooth and away So east,good value n comfy Delighted
customer_reviews.author: Gooner

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought them as a gift for my mum and she uses them all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ! Never seen something that cheap and that good
customer_reviews.author: luca

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: A bit difficult to link to phone but otherwise everything great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what I was looking for. Good price. Good quality. I am wearing them sometimes even if I am at home.
customer_reviews.author: Cozma Cristiana

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product at great price. Good noise cancellation, good sound quality. Don't really have to charge them so often.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good ?
customer_reviews.text: For the price you pay the quality of the product is really good, I use it whilst I'm running and they don't even fall out my ears, I've had similar priced anker ones and they were wired and they still kept falling out so a really good bang for a buck.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Natvarlal

product_meta.title: Xiaomi Redmi Airdots, TWS Bluetooth 5.0 Earphone Stereo Bass Wireless Headphones 300mAh Charging Box True Stereo Sound Mini Wireless Earbuds IPX4 Sweatproof Bluetooth Earphones with Mic AI Control
product_meta.description:
Xiaomi Redmi Airdots TWS Bluetooth Earphone Stereo Bass BT 5.0 Earphones With Mic Handsfree Earbuds AI Control

Specifications:
Brand: Xiaomi
Product Model: Redmi Airdots
Wireless Connection: Bluetooth 5.0
Bluetooth Protocol: HFP/A2DP/ HSP/AVRCP
Communication Distance: 10 meters (Accessible Environment)
Dual Headphones Continuously Listening Time: About 4 hours
Headphone Standby Time: About 150 hours
Single Earphone Battery Capacity: 40mAh
Charging Box Battery Capacity: 300mAh
Headphone Charging Time: About 1.5 hours
Charging Box Charging Time: About 2 hours
Single Earphone Net Weight: About 4.1g
Total Net Weight with Charging Box: Aapprox. 35.4g
Charging Box Size: 62 × 40 × 27.2mm
Headphone Size: 26.65 × 16.4 × 21.6mm

How to Pair:
First Connection for Dual Eeadphones:
1. Take two earphones from the box and it can be automatically turned on
2. Open mobile phone Bluetooth, and pairing Redmi AirDots_R; Left earphones do not need to be paired separately, it will automatically connected

How to Reset the Earphones:
1. Long press the multi-function button for 15 seconds until the red and white lights the second time alternately flash for 3 times and turn off, the device resets successfully
2. Ignore or cancel the pairing for Redmi AirDots_R in phone Bluetooth setting, delete connection record, the device resets successfully

What's in the Box?
1 * Redmi Airdots
1 * Charging Box
3 * Earplugs (S M L)
1 * User Manual
feature_bullets: 【NEW TECHNOLOGY BLUETOOTH V5.0】Xiaomi Mi Airdots A New Generation of Bluetooth 5.0, faster and more stable; Redmi AirDots is equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chip, the data transfer rate is up to 2 times compared with the previous generation, the connection is faster and more stable. More smoother to listen to songs and play games

【TRUE WIRELESS EXPERIENCE】Redmi AirDots is a true wireless headset, which means that the connection between the left and right earbuds disappears, but more easier experience; You will never worry about wire tangles while on true wireless earbuds; Throw away the bondage and feel the agility of music; As long as your device is within the range, Xiaomi Mini Bluetooth Earphones guarantee you quality music

【INTELLIGENT NOISE REDUCTION AND LIGHTWEIGHT】Redmi AirDots is equipped with 7.2mm dynamic unit and DSP intelligent environment noise reduction to enjoy HIFI sound quality and clear calling; 4.1g lightweight design, three models of earplugs to meet your higher requirements for closure and firmness, even when running, punching, and listening to music on the road

【MULTI-FUNCTION PHYSICAL BUTTON】Equipped with multi-function physical button to reduce false touches and support Voice control, double-click to wake up the phone voice assistant, very convenient to use (It requires mobile phone to support and open the voice assistant function)

【LONG BATTERY LIFE AND AUTOMATICALLY CONNECTED】4hr of battery life on one charge, 12hr of battery life with charging box; One earphone with 40mAh battery, Charging Box with 300mAh battery; Pick up and automatically connected

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
